tool_description: Get locations data of BNI ATM in Bogor
name: BNI ATM Locations
title: BNI ATM Locations

api_list.name: Get All Locations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bni-atm-locations.p.rapidapi.com/all-locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bni-atm-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bni-atm-locations.p.rapidapi.com/all-locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bni-atm-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
